title: NC A&T Coach: 'We're Like Kentucky Fried Chicken'
text:
NC A&T Coach: 'We're Like Kentucky Fried Chicken' North Carolina A&T Head Football Coach Rod Broadway compared his football team to Kentucky Fried Chicken. Post to Facebook NC A&T Coach: 'We're Like Kentucky Fried Chicken' North Carolina A&T Head Football Coach Rod Broadway compared his football team to Kentucky Fried Chicken.  //on.wfmy.com/1RKKvpk   Join the Conversation To   NC A&T Coach: 'We're Like Kentucky Fried Chicken' NC A&T Head Coach: We just do chicken. WFMY News 2 Sports Liz Crawford, WFMY News 2 3:21 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 NC A&T Head Coach Rod Broadway (Photo: WFMY News 2 Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
GREENSBORO, N.C. -- North Carolina A&T Head Football Coach Rod Broadway compared his football team to Kentucky Fried Chicken. It was the best sound bite of the week and we just had to share. Enjoy: 
We're like Kentucky Fried Chicken. We just do chicken. We'll throw a gizzard or a liver in there but we do chicken. We don't do hamburger, we don't do beef. We do chicken so we do the same thing over and over and over again. We get into a routine and we like to stay in the routine that we're in so we don't change a lot from day to day from week to week whether we're at home or we're away. 
NC A&T is 4-1 on the season. They're back home in Aggie Stadium Saturday taking on Bethune-Cookman at 1 PM. Read or Share this story: http://on.wfmy.com/1RKKvpk TOP VIDEOS
